MiniPoop.name: Alien Feces (Small)
MiniPoop.desc: A small quantity of fecal matter from alien fauna.

SeabaseSonar.name: Seabase Sonar Antenna
SeabaseSonar.desc: Continuously fires sonar pulses from a seabase.

SeabaseRepellent.name: Seabase Creature Repellant Antenna
SeabaseRepellent.desc: Discourages close approach of creatures to the seabase.

SpineEelDesc.desc: An aggressive and poison-resistant eel-like predator found exclusively in the Lost River.

GhostRayDesc.desc: A large passive herbivore with unusual biology adapted to its native environment.

CrimsonRayDesc.desc: A highly heat-resistant ray species closely related to ghost rays.

BiterDesc.desc: A small fast predator, most dangerous in swarms.

BlighterDesc.desc: A deep-sea and nearly-blind variant of the biter. Prefers carrion to live prey.
